FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: Venser wondered if it could still be called a teleportation spell if the destination is oblivion.
Venser si chiese se poteva essere chiamata una magia di teletrasporto anche se la destinazione era l’oblio.
Venser fragte sich, ob man noch von einem Teleport-Zauber sprechen könne, wenn das Ziel die Vergessenheit ist.
Venser se demandait si on pouvait toujours parler d’un sort de téléportation quand la destination était le néant.
Venser se preguntaba si se consideraba un hechizo de teletransportación cuando el destino era el olvido.
ヴェンセールは、目的地が忘却の彼方である呪文を瞬間移動と呼んでいいものか悩んだ。
Venser wondered if it could still be called a teleportation spell if the destination is oblivion.
Венсер задумался: можно ли назвать заклинание телепортацией, если оно ведет в забвение?
Venser pensou se ainda poderia considerá-la uma mágica de teletransporte quando o destino final era o limbo.

SPELL_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。
SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local total = 0 local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() total = filter:CountStopAt( 3 ) local target_card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target_card ~= nil then target_card:Tap() if total > 2 then target_card:RemoveFromGame() end end
